[{"id":"4eeccd6f-07d5-4451-bdba-99d28e157788","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get_mod_dir","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f363fcba-7992-4177-b099-01c7efbdbce8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose:

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Provides access to the currently configured project root directory.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3253e4a8-551e-49a8-b8aa-e3d3b08598ac","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"What it does:

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Returns the package path set during initialization. This value is used throughout the import analysis to determine whether a module is internal and to help resolve relative paths.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ebed2a38-7c67-43af-b534-8393db2bc2b3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
